name: minder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who protects another person, often a famous person, from danger and unwanted public attention: The president arrived surrounded by his minders.
someone who controls what another person says and does: His public-relations minder refused to allow him to answer any of the journalists' questions.
